title: This is Nigeria
creator_credit: Lionel Snazelle and Nigeria. Federal Information Unit
brief_description: A detailed survey of Nigeria’s natural resources, such as rubber, cocoa, tin and oil, and the life, handicrafts and festivals of the various peoples which make up the Nigerian nation.
